title: My Boss My Hero [Korean 2001]
description:
Product Title   :    My Boss My Hero
Artist Name(s) :  Jung Woon Teck | Jung Jun Ho | Jung Woong In
Release Date :  May 21, 2002
Language :    Korean
Subtitle     : English

When a young gang leader seems to be just a bit too stupid to effectively carry out his daily tasks--embarrassing his gang members and himself frequently--his superiors order him to go back to school for his high school diploma. Once situated in the school, posing as a 19-year-old, he soon learns that the school is even more corrupt and vicious a place to spend his days than in his gang. After he can't stand it any longer, he decides to stop playing &quot;the innocent student&quot; and unleashes his wrath on the place.
